name: Hephaestus
description:
My submission to the Ludum Dare 37 Compo. The theme was "One Room"

In this game, you play as Hephaestus, a blacksmith who lives in a cave. You can't fight, or even leave with your bum leg, but you are determined to leave a mark on history. By giving out magical (or cursed) items, you can turn the tide of the wars.
